Types

Anchor = enum
  TopLeft, TopCenter, TopRight, CenterLeft, Center, CenterRight, BottomLeft,
  BottomCenter, BottomRight
Pivot = enum
  TopLeft, TopCenter, TopRight, CenterLeft, Center, CenterRight, BottomLeft,
  BottomCenter, BottomRight

Consts

anchorOffsets: array[Anchor, Vec2] = [(arr: [0.0, 0.0]), (arr: [0.5, 0.0]),
                                      (arr: [1.0, 0.0]), (arr: [0.0, 0.5]),
                                      (arr: [0.5, 0.5]), (arr: [1.0, 0.5]),
                                      (arr: [0.0, 1.0]), (arr: [0.5, 1.0]),
                                      (arr: [1.0, 1.0])]
pivotOffsets: array[Pivot, Vec2] = [(arr: [0.0, 0.0]), (arr: [0.5, 0.0]),
                                    (arr: [1.0, 0.0]), (arr: [0.0, 0.5]),
                                    (arr: [0.5, 0.5]), (arr: [1.0, 0.5]),
                                    (arr: [0.0, 1.0]), (arr: [0.5, 1.0]),
                                    (arr: [1.0, 1.0])]
